title: Critical Error - constant
body:
So I've had this problem on and off for about a week now. its not every game, but the games it happens in I cannot load the 2nd page after Champion select. 
I have tried to repair, Run as admin, and look around to see what else I could do, I ended up having to re-Download the game to try and sort this problem out. 

does anyone have an idea of whats causing this?

replies.body: You have to disable Avast antivirus
It's not an issue I'm at all familiar with so I'd recommend you submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
